title: Stationary Bike Workout 🚴 6 Min Cardio Exercise ||
description:
Exercise bike workout in VR headset will improve your physical and mental condition, thanks to sunny stationary bike scenery videos.  

→ https://youtu.be/e1emQDNYb9w←   


In this 6-minute workout, you will crush your legs with just an exercise bike. The Tabata protocol, developed by Dr. Izumi Tabata consists of alternating short periods of intense exercise with short periods of rest for a period of 4 minutes.  This bike workout start with 2 minutes basic warm-up.


Subscribe Our Channel:  

➨  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCmI0gvUMl5FJGIVU5zBZ5TQ?sub_confirmation=1

Follow me on Social Media:

➨ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Fitness-in-VR-1838239922922523/
➨ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/peter_luksza/?hl=en
➨ Twitter: https://twitter.com/peterluksza

Stationary bike workout is crucial to keep people in shape, improve fitness strengths.  Indoor bike workout at home, or fitness classes if it suits you, has an impact on your wellbeing.  Bicycle workout at home on stationary bike is one of the most popular cardio exercise, where you are using indoor spinning workouts in your workout routine.  Stationary bike benefits over treadmill is lower impact on exerciser’s joints, so is recommended for people who complains on sore joints. Fitness trainer will recommend using variety of cardio machines in workout routine to avoid over train some specific muscles during cardio exercises and to avoid boredom. 
Your opinion is crucial for us, and every signal is important, so please answer to the questions below as a comment to the video.

- Is Cycling Workout good for you?
- What are Cycling Workouts?
- Are Cycling Workouts Classes good workout?
- What does Indoor Cycling Workout?

We appreciate your input.

FiVR - Fitness in VR Official Youtube Channel.

The purpose of this channel is to provide YouTuber’s with training videos to entertain them during cardio exercises. 

The experience I do have, during a cardio workout on an indoor bike, wasn’t good, as I always got bored after just a few minutes. I constantly checked the progress, and I got this feeling I will not be able to complete my workout, drives me crazy. Everything has changed when I rendered my first movie. I focused on the exercise rather than on the progress. By wearing VR goggles I was cut from the surrounding world, and my consciousness was moved into the virtual reality. I was able to exercise for much longer, up to 60 min. Finally, I decided to share my experience with YouTube.

#FitnessInVR #ExerciseBike #CardioExercise
channelDescription:
Indoor Cycling is in majority of videos we provide, but you will find cross trainer and virtual rowing workouts on @Fitnessinvrfivr channel. Videos are build to help you lose weight and get fit fast.

The experience I do have, during a cardio workout on an indoor bike wasn’t good, as I always got bored after just a few minutes. I constantly checked the progress, and I got this feeling I will not be able to complete my workout, drives me crazy. Everything has changed, when I rendered my first movie. I focused on the exercise rather then on the progress. By wearing VR goggles I was cut from the surrounding world, and my consciousness was moved into the virtual reality. I was able to exercise for much longer, up to 60 min. Finally, I decided to share my experience and 360 VR Video with YouTube.

Thanks for watching
Peter

#FitnessInVR #IndoorCycling #VR
